gen:link.msg:message: `IncomeFromInvestments` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeFromInvestments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeFromInvestments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IncomeFromOtherInvestments` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit6_IncomeFromOtherInvestments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit6_IncomeFromOtherInvestments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit6_ChildrenOfIncomeFromOtherInvestmentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit6_ChildrenOfIncomeFromOtherInvestmentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit6_ChildrenOfIncomeFromOtherInvestmentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit6_ChildrenOfIncomeFromOtherInvestmentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de huidige periode) BEHOORT gerapporteerd te worden, omdat `NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de voorgaande periode) en `ResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de huidige periode) gerapporteerd worden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de voorgaande periode) BEHOORT gerapporteerd te worden, omdat `NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de huidige periode) en `ResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de voorgaande periode) gerapporteerd worden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen binnen dezelfde context, omdat `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest` wordt gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementNonTechnicalAccountInsurance_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
